<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dispelling Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=594) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 189 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target. Make a Strike against a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature. If your Strike deals sneak attack damage, you attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) a single spell active on the target (your choice). Your counteract level is equal to half your level (rounded up), and your counteract check modifier is equal to your class DC – 10.
name: Dispelling Slice
